lead_paragraph: THE YOUNG SUCKER: VOLUNTEERS IN MEXICO.--A writer in a Canadian paper, describing the peculiarities of the young men in Illinois, tells the following Story: "The way that the young sucker volunteers fought in Mexico, may give you some idea of characteristics. He was there perfectly desperate in a fight:
